greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array read by antidiagonals of T(n,k)=(4k-2)*T(n,k-1)+T(n,k-2) with T(n,0)=1 and T(n,1)=n.
formula: T(n, k) =2*T(n-1, k)-T(n-2, k). T(n, k)/T(1, k) tends to ( (n-1)*e - (n-3) )/2 as k increases: e.g. T(3, k)/T(1, k) tends to e.
xref: Rows include A002119 (unsigned), A079165, A001517. Columns include A000012, A001477, A016921 (offset).
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Dec 31 2002
